name: get_ip_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool all_information_about_ip.
Tool description: API for getting information about ip address, taken from several databases, compared.
API description: Fetches information about a given IP address using the Toolbench API.

query.description: The IP address to query information about.

lang.description: The language of the response. Default is 'en'.
